name: Nova's Engagement
description:
Once upon a time there was a distant kingdom. Such kingdom was ruled by a king and a queen. People say the rulers had magical powers that prevented creatures and wild beasts invading the kingdom, which is protected by a stone wall. Their inhabitants lived their happily lives, but outside the walls it was impossible for them to survive.

A long time ago a white dragon tried to invade the kingdom but several fire elementals summoned by the king stopped her. Since then the dragon has never attacked again but she swore revenge.

Nova is the latest heiress to the royal throne. Her dad is pressuring her to a marriage, until the day he got a fiancee for her. Should Nova accept him or should her run away from everything?

This is my submission to NaNoRenO 2019 #IntRenAiMo.

Notes

  1.  This game is still being made, so I'm using placeholders in some places.
  2. I translated to English almost all dialogues, I may have missed one stuff or two (but the menu stuff is still in Portuguese).
  3. Feel free to post any bug you may find.
